thread.title: Ted Cruz moves to escape Donald Trump's shadow, claim his supporters with cash haul
thread.title_full: Ted Cruz moves to escape Donald Trump's shadow, claim his supporters with cash haul - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Ted Cruz moves to escape Donald Trump's shadow, claim his supporters with cash haul
text: After spending several months drafting behind Donald Trump, Sen. Ted Cruz appears to be making his move to escape the billionaire businessman's wake and try to capture his loyal supporters in the GOP presidential nomination contest, putting the first chinks in the unusual alliance that had developed between the two ... ...
